SKT_FIRST.name: Max! Heart Catch!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to increase the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>3%</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000021_1_2]</color> chance to increase the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000021_1_2]</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: マックス☆ハートキャッチ
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>3%</color> 회복합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3%</color>UPさせる。\nこのスキルは、自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Splash Star

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Grants Counterattack +2 turns to ally with highest attack
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に反撃+2ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Extends the caster's buffs by 1 turn\nGrants an extra turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 自分の強化効果+1ターン\n追加ターン発生

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Twinkle Twinkle ☆
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000021_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000021_3_1] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

2_jp: 自分に免疫付与+1ターン
5_jp: 挑発強化\n(効果抵抗無視)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: キラキラ☆トゥインクル
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>도발</color>합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>60%</color>の確率で対象を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>挑発</color>する。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>heal</color> the caster. The amount healed is proportional to the caster's Defense.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000021_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000021_backup_1_1]</color> chance to <color=#28d9ed>heal</color> the caster. The amount healed is proportional to the caster's Defense.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 회복합니다. 회복량은 자신의 방어력에 비례하여 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を回復する。回復量は自分の防御力が高いほどUPする。
